LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_cumflation_d: Enables Cum-flation and other vaginal fluid insertion Hediffs.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_cumflation_modifier: Modifies how much fluid is necessary for a full inflation. Higher number mean more fluid necessary, lower numbers less.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_stuffing_des: Enables Cum-stuffing and other oral+anal fluid insertion Hediffs.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_stuffing_modifier_d: Modifies how much fluid is necessary for a full stuffing. Higher number mean more fluid necessary, lower numbers less.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_bukkake_desc: Enables Bukkake and other Fluid-based body-covers.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_bukkake_modifier_de: Modifies how much fluid is necessary for a full covering. Higher number mean more fluid necessary, lower numbers less.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_fluid_gather: When enabled, cleaning fluid-filth can spawn respective items (Chance based on FluidGatheringDefs).
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_max_gathering_check: The gathering-items use a max-distance to find items in their room. High values might lead to performance issues when placed outside or in big, crowded rooms.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_progressing_: When enabled, the pawns will gain thoughts on Fluid-Consumption, depending on their preferences and how much of it they consumed already.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_oscillation_: When enabled, Hediffs are added post-sex and on celibacy that change fluid-amount (Blue balls, drained and wet).
Applies the oscillation mechanics to player faction animals.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_debug_loggin: When enabled, more detailed logging will take place.
LanguageData.cumpilation_cumsettings_enable_filth_key: Enable generation of Filth while deflating over time.
LanguageData.cumpilation_cumsettings_enable_filth_des: If disabled, pawns that are filled with cum will no longer generate filth as they naturaly deflate.
LanguageData.cumpilation_cumsettings_enable_autodefla: If enabled, pawns will automatically deflate themselves into buckets when cumflated.

If enabled, pawns will automatically deflate themselves into toilets, showers, etc. when cumflated (Requires Dubs Bad Hygiene).\nNote that pawns will prioritize buckets and toilets when they are available.
If enabled, pawns will automatically deflate themselves anywhere when cumflated.\nNote that pawns will prioritize buckets and toilets when they are available.
LanguageData.cumpilation_cumsettings_enable_privacy_d: If enabled, pawns will get upset if they are seen while deflating themselves. They will also try to find a private spot to do so.
LanguageData.cumpilation_cumsettings_min_autodeflate_: Pawns will only automatically deflate themselves when cumflation severity is above this value.\nFor reference, severity below 0.2 usually has no effect, and severity above 0.9 will usually immobilize the pawn. Severity will almost never exceed 1.0.\nDefault: 0.4
LanguageData.cumpilation_cumsettings_max_deflatedista: The maximum distance a pawn will travel when looking for a spot to deflate.\nDefault: 100
LanguageData.cumpilation_cumsettings_leak_amount_mult: The amount of filth generated by leaking cum will be multiplied by this value.\nDefault: 5.0
LanguageData.cumpilation_cumsettings_leak_speed_multi: The speed of leaking cum will be multiplied by this value.\nDefault: 1.0
LanguageData.cumpilation_cumsettings_deflate_amount_m: The amount of filth generated by deflating into buckets will be multiplied by this value.\nDefault: 5.0
LanguageData.cumpilation_cumsettings_deflate_speed_mu: The speed of deflating cum will be multiplied by this value.\nDefault: 1.0
